canAddFavorite: You can add an item to your favorites
descNotification: You have an appointment with “certified personal name” after 1 hour
exploreService: You can explore categories, service providers profiles and book your service
name: Name
lengthPassword: Password must be at least 8 characters long
upperCase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
lowerCase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
specialCharacter: Password must contain at least one special character
oneNumber: Password must contain at least one Number
confirmLogout: Are you sure you want to log out?
confirmDeleteAccount: Are you sure you want to delete account?
deleteLogOutSide: You’ll need to log in again to access your account.
deleteAccountSide: Once you delete your account, all your data and records will be permanently lost and cannot be recovered. Do you want to proceed?
resetYourPasswordEasily: Reset your password easily by entering your phone number and we will send code to verify
verifyEmailCode: We've sent a verification code to your email to verify your account.
verificationAccountCode: We've sent a verification code to your SMS to verify your account.
selectRole: Now you can choose your role: book services or offer your expertise 🥰
notReceiveNotification: Stay tuned! Important updates and service alerts will appear here. 🚀
onBoardingMainTextOne: Welcome to the World of Beauty
onBoardingDescTextOne: Discover the World of Beauty with pretty Yuka!. Everything you need in beauty services at your fingertips, from haircuts to skincare.
onBoardingDescTextTwo: Secure Payments. Book your appointments effortlessly and pay securely through our app.
onBoardingDescTextThree: Are you a Beauty Expert? Join Us!. Offer your services and start working with us to increase your income and enhance your professional experience.
